name: Roman Decimals
description:
Features of the application Roman Decimals are :

1.  Roman numeral to decimal number conversion (upto MMMCMXCIX).

2.  Decimal number to Roman numeral conversion (upto 3999).

3.  Effortlessly fits any screen size and orientation.

4.  Beautiful and minimalistic user interface.

5.  Supports dark mode.

6.  Completely ad free.

If you like it please leave a review 💚

Contact me at animaxneil.epizy.com for any feedback or queries.

I am a newbie to the dev community 💚
